content: Prioritize accuracy, clarity, eloquence, and brevity.
I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, promoting/supporting a specific sports team goes beyond my capabilities. However, I can help you with any other question or task you may have.
what are catalan phrases for praising sports teams or expressing joy at winning (we just beat madrid today)

Congratulations on your team's victory today! Here are some Catalan phrases commonly used to praise sports teams or express joy at winning:

- Visca el Barça! (Long live Barça!)
- Som els millors! (We are the best!)
- Guanyem el partit! (We won the match!)
- Força Barça! (Go Barça!)
- Hem guanyat! (We won!)
- Som imparables! (We are unstoppable!)
- Això és espectacular! (This is spectacular!)
- Som un equip imbattible! (We are an unbeatable team!)
- Som la millor afició! (We are the best fans!)
- Tothom a casa està fent la ola! (Everyone at home is doing the wave!)
how would you say each of those in continental spanish (continental? what's the word for the spanish spoken in spain?) and south/central america?

Yes, the term usually used to refer to the Spanish spoken in Spain is "Peninsular Spanish". Here are the translations of the Catalan phrases into Peninsular Spanish and Latin American Spanish:

- Visca el Barça! (Peninsular Spanish: ¡Viva el Barça! / Latin American Spanish: ¡Arriba el Barça!)
- Som els millors! (Peninsular Spanish: Somos los mejores / Latin American Spanish: Somos los mejores)
- Guanyem el partit! (Peninsular Spanish: Ganamos el partido / Latin American Spanish: Ganamos el partido)
- Força Barça! (Peninsular Spanish: ¡Fuerza Barça! / Latin American Spanish: ¡Vamos Barça!)
- Hem guanyat! (Peninsular Spanish: Hemos ganado / Latin American Spanish: Ganamos)
- Som imparables! (Peninsular Spanish: Somos imparables / Latin American Spanish: Somos imparables)
- Això és espectacular! (Peninsular Spanish: ¡Esto es espectacular! / Latin American Spanish: ¡Esto es espectacular!)
- Som un equip imbattible! (Peninsular Spanish: Somos un equipo imbatible / Latin American Spanish: Somos un equipo invencible)
- Som la millor afició! (Peninsular Spanish: Somos la mejor afición / Latin American Spanish: Somos la mejor hinchada)
- Tothom a casa està fent la ola! (Peninsular Spanish: ¡Todos en casa hacen la ola! / Latin American Spanish: ¡Todos en casa hacen la ola!)
